item.title: At least 43 dead in catastrophic Texas flooding and dozens missing from girls camp
item.description: Flash flooding slammed the Texas Hill Country overnight on Friday. At least 27 girls from a summer camp next to the Guadalupe River remain missing.

item.title: Here's a timeline of the catastrophic Texas floods
item.description: NPR has compiled a timeline of when local, state and federal officials posted warnings on social media as well as the timeline of events as presented ...

item.title: Cuts to HIV research funding in the US impacts progress towards ending the epidemic
item.description: How will the Trump administration's cuts to HIV research impact the progress that's been made towards ending the epidemic in the U.S.?

item.title: Heat and wildfire smoke affect birth outcomes, according to a new study
item.description: Heat and wildfire smoke affect birth outcomes, according to a new study of women in Los Angeles.

item.title: Photos: Texas reels from deadly flooding
item.description: Gov. Greg Abbott says the state will work day and night to find people who may be stranded and unable to call for help.
